name: Localish
description: Leisurely is a mobile-first app, developed for market lovers and those who want support the local businesses by creating awarness of the small little markets every visitor should know of your city.It's a full MERN stack application, and the final project of Ironhack's Web Development Bootcamp.

name: Leisurely
description: This social media platform is for people who like to join group activities. Leisurely is a full stack desktop-only designed project, focused on the back-end architecture and built as the module 2 project for Ironhack's Web Development Bootcamp.
